text: Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad!
Be strong, Be brave, Be smart, Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad!
Ba Ba Bottle Squad!
“Ha! I got it!”
“Oof! Why do you roll it so hard, Blake? Haha!”
“Sorry! Super Strength isn’t always the best to use, huh?”
“Babies! Miss Polly is on her way and she needs your help
“ what is the problem”?
“Bottle Squad!
My sick little dolly is lost.
She disappeared as soon as I called the doctor.”
“Don’t worry Miss Polly
We will find your Dolly.
Let’s go babies!”
“Ba-Ba-BOOM! We’re ready to zoom!!”
Miss Polly, Do you have anything of Dolly’s on you?”
Miss Polly had a dolly who was sick, sick, sick
So, she called for the doctor to come quick, quick, quick,
The doctor came with his bag and his hat
And he knocked on the door with a rata, tat, tat!
Power Pet Barkie sniffed around and around,
But the dolly was nowhere to be found found found,
He sniffed over here and he sniffed over there,
He sniffed a dolly scent in the air, air, air
Barkie’s found the scent and he’s on the trail,
He moves fast wagging his tail tail tail
The squad sees the dark hall leading to the dark room,
Becca’s on the case with a zoom, zoom, zoom
Becca in the room, found nothing there,
She told the squad to look elsewhere, where, where,
Ben, using super sight, saw a trail of crumbs,crumbs crumbs
Leading past the store with the drums, drums, drums!”
“Here’s your dolly ma’am! At the best muffin shop in the mall!
“Oh! My precious dolly!
I’m so glad you’re safe!
I thought you were sick…”
“I’m sorry Miss Polly about faking sick,
‘Heard about some muffins, ‘had to come real quick,
I just wanted a few, I didn’t mean for any worry,
But now my stomach hurts so I’m not in a hurry.
For any more muffins that is!”
“Oh my sweet little dolly, you’re safe and sound!
With the help of bottle squad you were found found found
Next time when you’re hungry, please just let me know,
So you don’t have to look high and low low low! [Miss Polly: “I love you, Dolly!”]
“I love you too!”
“Aww!!”
“If you need our help, you can count on us!
That’s our Ba-Ba-Promise to you!”
